You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

DESCRIPTION:
The grid is a simple crossword puzzle with 5 rows and 5 columns. The first row has the letters A, B, C, and D, while the second row has the letters E, F, G, and H. The third row has the letters I, J, K, and L, while the fourth row has the letters M, N, O, and P. The fifth row has the letters Q, R, S, and T. The puzzle is not completed, so some of the letters are blank.
